data.name: Compute Vertex World Space Position
data.script:
vec4 v = (WorldSpaceFromLocalSpaceMatrix * vec4(LocalSpacePosition, 1.0));
worldPosition = v.xyz / v.w;

data.name: compute vertex world space position
data.script:
vec4 v = (ws_from_ls_mat* vec4(ls_position, 1.0));
ws_position = v.xyz / v.w;

outputs.name: attenuation
outputs.script:

attenuation = 1.0 / max(dist * dist, 0.01 * 0.01);

data.name: FresnelEffect
data.script:
vec3 I = normalize(vs_FragmentPosition - vs_CameraPosition);
F = pow(1.0 + dot(I, normalize(vs_Normal)), Power);
